status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70ak2","text":"Drop 12 mm coverslips into a 200 ml beaker containing 95% Ethanol (or methanol). (Leave at least  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48vfq","text":"Plate coverslips on a 24-well plate and allow to completely dry (\u003e ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fos1n","text":"Dilute PDL to   with borate buffer (  PDL solution +   borate buffer) and coat coverslips with   PDL for   in the incubator or   in the TC hood. Plastic plates can be coated similarly (100 µL for 96-well).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":95,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":105,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1527}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"47.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"uohb","text":"Wash coverslips or plates 3-5x in tissue culture water. Remove all culture water from coverslips or plates, then allow to dry for   + in TC hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3id0f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5cd1u","text":"Add neuron medium to plates and incubate at   in incubator \u003e   to equilibrate (50 µL for 96-well, 0.5 mL 24-well, 1 mL 12-well, 2 mL 6-well). If using a 96-well plate, add   of PBS in periphery wells and   of PBS between wells.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":172,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":204,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1linl","text":"Equilibrate a T25 or T75 flask of neuronal medium in the incubator. Can also warm Neurobasal to   for wash steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"48hej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f26v","text":"Make the papain dissociation solution (see Media section). Each T25 flask can hold tissue from 1 to maximum 20 mouse preps.  Sterile filter (syringe filter or Steriflip, depending on volume) and keep in T25 flask in the incubator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3l4l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm0dd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2jh1p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5l6fa","text":"*Solution needs to be warmed prior to filtering.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5a1av","text":"Apply CO2 to dam as indicated in IACUC protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5alee","text":"Dislocate spine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7cbes","text":"Pin dam, abdomen up, to Styrofoam covered with lab mat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"80fai","text":"Spray dam with 70% ethanol thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5dm6d","text":"With dissection scissors, open the abdominal cavity, avoiding internal organs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaijh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ea1b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6v5bt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8op44","text":"These gross dissection tools should not also be used for fine dissection of the sterile embryos.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epdlo","text":"Grasp the uterus with forceps. Lift and cut the uterus out. Transfer to a 10 cm culture dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60f3l","text":"Cut the uterus and remove the embryonic sacs to release embryos into a fresh dish  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57su4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7713a","text":"Decapitate pup, allowing head to fall into a 10 cm dish filled with HBSS  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2pq0i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ici7","text":"Using forceps, hold head by the eyes. Using the other hand and a curved or angled forceps, pinch the scalp just behind the eyes and pull back, tearing it off. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pvqf","text":"Next, use a micro-scissor to cut down the mid-sagittal skull, and gently peel the skull off with forceps, being careful in case any tissue still connects it to the rest of the skull. Gently remove brain (using a spatula or curved forceps) and place into Petri dish filled with ice cold sterile Hibernate Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rdcr","text":"Gently separate hemispheres, removing the thalamus, striatum, and brainstem.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a48he","text":"Grasp the olfactory bulb and pull caudal, slowly removing the meninges from the cortex. While still grasping the meninges, flip the hemisphere and remove meninges from the hippocampus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pmou","text":"Using micro-scissors, cut the hippocampus away from the cortex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23fkd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p9t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8os9e","text":"Torn tissue makes for worse culture than cleanly-cut tissue due to excess DNA release.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73gfk","text":"Hippocampi can be left whole. If cortical tissue is to be used, it should be cut into 1 mm³ segments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmq1i","text":"Place all segments into a conical with Hibernate medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5k9s","text":"Bring to biosafety cabinet. Everything from here on should be done in a sterile biosafety cabinet. Pipette out Hibernate medium and rinse twice with fresh,   HBSS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":156,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctec6","text":"Add   [170 U] DNase/  papain solution and gently rotate until pieces of tissue are separated. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei029","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ev1fh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fqkld","text":"If needed, remove as much of this solution as possible, add fresh HBSS and DNase to remove residual DNA.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2a9r7","text":"Rinse chunks 2-3 times using 5 ml Neurobasal (warmed to  ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1kkk4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3513g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9b9ra","text":"Do NOT use vacuum for these steps since you might vacuum up your tissue.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddgrf","text":"Remove as much media as possible and resuspend cells in   of neuron medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ermqo","text":"Mechanically dissociate cells (do not over triturate!). First, pipet up and down with 1000 µL tips ~10-15 times (when done properly the medium becomes slightly opalescent with dissociated cells). Next, use a 200 µL tip ~20 times. The chunks should now be completely dissociated into individual cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"248h2","text":"Bring total volume to 6 mL Neurobasal and strain through a 40 μm cell strainer into a 50 mL conical, rinsing strainer with 2 mL Neurobasal before and after. Transfer cells to 15 mL conical.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vkdk","text":"Centrifuge cells at  . Resuspend the pellet in 2 mL of neuron media, mix and count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d00ab","text":"Dilute cell suspension to 1,000,000 cells/mL. For 96-well, cells should be diluted to 170,000 cell/mL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1coop","text":"Add the appropriate volume to the well of the neuron media-containing dishes so that each well contains:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k6f9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3877n","text":"17,000 cells (96-well) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16ijc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5dnen","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g0md","text":"100,000 cells (24-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdtpu","text":"250,000 cells (12-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8mtm","text":"1,000,000 cells (6-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a9c4t","text":"For 96-well plates cells should be gently agitated in a reservoir before being added directly to the middle of the well.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mrmk","text":"Gently agitate plates back and forth in each direction to spread cells. Place in incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pjh0","text":"Cells can be checked the next day for adherence and even distribution. Neurons will start to sprout neurites within the first few days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cj2s0","text":"Add additional media to each well once a week:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79g3a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vjru","text":"20 μL (96-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eohjs","text":"115 μL (24-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p6hc","text":"330 μL(12-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18i9e","text":"1 mL (6-well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"630ss","text":"Use 10 mL serological pipet to move tissue from T25 flask into 15 mL conical.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4e82q","text":"Use serological pipet to transfer chunks to papain and move to   incubator, laid flat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"41EAE59BFC1011EEB7160A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6i6ko","text":"Digest for approximately  -  or until chunks have fallen apart and look something like cotton candy. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"4B67B54CFC1011EEB7160A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"4B67B5E1FC1011EEB7160A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Embryonic/Postnatal Mouse Neuron Culture Protocol
